title: EyeFilter PRO - Bluelight
summary: Now, Eyefilter protects your exhausted eyes from bluelight exposure
description: The ingenious application for your exhaysted eyes is rolledout!!As smartphone becomes inseparable daily necessity all day long,Please find a betterway of using smartphone with Eyefilter, relieaving the strain on your eyes■ This application protects smartphone users from bluelight exposure, causing insomnia and amblyopia - Prevent the screen from radiating bluelight   - It is good for protecting visual acuity of smartphone user, especially for children and office workers  - It doesn't cause quick battery drain, consuming less battery power supply■ Easy access to Eyefilter usage setting  - It is easy to access and change the usage setting(On/OFF) with widget function  - It is possible to adjust the opacity by double clicking the widget■ A variety of themes and altering function of notification  - Express your own indiviuality through a variety of themes selection   - Set themes of widget on the wallpaper - Alter the notification comment and icon with your own preference■ Bluelight filter for optimal eyesight - Optimal 5 sort of filters are available  - Prevent others from peeping your screen by adjusting the opacity■ What is bluelight? - Bluelight is blue colored light with very short and visibel wavelength between 380 and 500 nm(nanometer).   It used to serve as medical treatment for pimples in dermatology. However, many experts say that persistent exposure of blue light is quite dangerous.   Namely, long time exposure of bluelight might cause xerophthalmia and even bring damage to retina nad eye lens.   Furthermore, bluelight exposure from smatphone and TV in the late night, sound sleep would be interupted by hampered sleep inducing hormons secretion.
descriptionHTML:
The ingenious application for your exhaysted eyes is rolledout!!
As smartphone becomes inseparable daily necessity all day long,
Please find a betterway of using smartphone with Eyefilter, relieaving the strain on your eyes

■ This application protects smartphone users from bluelight exposure, causing insomnia and amblyopia
- Prevent the screen from radiating bluelight
- It is good for protecting visual acuity of smartphone user, especially for children and office workers
- It doesn't cause quick battery drain, consuming less battery power supply

■ Easy access to Eyefilter usage setting
- It is easy to access and change the usage setting(On/OFF) with widget function
- It is possible to adjust the opacity by double clicking the widget

■ A variety of themes and altering function of notification
- Express your own indiviuality through a variety of themes selection
- Set themes of widget on the wallpaper
- Alter the notification comment and icon with your own preference

■ Bluelight filter for optimal eyesight
- Optimal 5 sort of filters are available
- Prevent others from peeping your screen by adjusting the opacity

■ What is bluelight?
- Bluelight is blue colored light with very short and visibel wavelength between 380 and 500 nm(nanometer).
It used to serve as medical treatment for pimples in dermatology. However, many experts say that persistent exposure of blue light is quite dangerous.
Namely, long time exposure of bluelight might cause xerophthalmia and even bring damage to retina nad eye lens.
Furthermore, bluelight exposure from smatphone and TV in the late night, sound sleep would be interupted by hampered sleep inducing hormons secretion.
comments: this is one of those apps that are free for a limited time and i download just to have never thinking Id actually use it.  Glad to say I was totally wrong. it really works and definitly noticed a difference how my eyes feel after long screen time. slick, easy to use interface with just enough options to not be overwhelming. now considering it a must have app!

Needs location based scheduling for night mode. Takes up a lot of memory compared to other apps in the category. Launching other overlay apps causes the screen brightness to go back to normal, which is kinda glitchy. This should be on top of everything else so that the brightness stays the same. Kindly update.

This is an excellent blue light filter app. I find Twilight's notification options a bit underwhelming and it doesn't have filter color options, but I miss the sunset scheduling and Twilight gives a description and color temperature on the adjustment slider.
Too bad... To bad this app doesn't support filtering of the transparent navigation bar. How much I like the rest of the app and all the features. I am installing it.

This really is brilliant. I got the free version and upgraded to pro just a couple days after I got it all set up. I have major light sensitivity due to my Severe ME, and so using devices can be very painful for my eyes and cause migraines too. I tried twilight but there were certain aspects that didn't work for me... and I like how eye filter is designed for all day use, though the pro version does have a basic (but reliable!) scheduling function on it, if that works better for you. It's very customisable, with different coloured filters, and I also like how it has a button you can place on your home page to quickly turn it on and off. (though note - you have to remove the button as well as the filter every time you need to change permissions for any app - this is a security function of Android though, not an issue with the app itself!). This app works  brilliantly and has definitely reduced eye pain!!
Sucks It's crashing like hell. I can take it no longer. Please release an update, resolving this issue.
